description.en: SaltyBet (also known as Salty's Dream Cast Casino) is a betting site where users may bet fake money on the outcomes of A.I.-controlled M.U.G.E.N battles. The fights are broadcasted through Twitch 24/7, and feature a variety of characters and stages. SaltyBet is one of the most active M.U.G.E.N-related websites, with over 22 million views on its Twitch stream.
